title: January Favorites.

author: Jessica
excerpt: A peek at everything I loved in January 2025! FOOD Trader Joe’s Aglio Olio seasoning. I can’t believe how much I love this. It is delicious on everything. NYT chicken and red lentil soup. I’ve made this twice now and it’s incredible. I add a little more spice/heat but wow – so nourishing. Patagonia Provisions […]
text: A peek at everything I loved in January 2025! FOOD Trader Joe’s Aglio Olio seasoning. I can’t believe how much I love this. It is delicious on everything. NYT chicken and red lentil soup. I’ve made this twice now and it’s incredible. I add a little more spice/heat but wow – so nourishing. Patagonia Provisions sourdough crackers. New-to-me crackers that I LOVE. And I am not a huge cracker person. My blueberry muffin baked oatmeal. We have been making this on REPEAT. I love it so so much. Great to prep ahead of time. HOME Souper Cubes. These are not new but I use them every week! I make so many soups and this is perfect to freeze portions. I love it. It’s very easy to pop out one portion or more. White post-in notes. Sounds ridiculous, but these white post-its are so nice compared to the neon ones all over my kitchen. I also love the black ones! Moccamaster coffee maker. I got one in December after not having a pot for coffee… basically, well, ever. I need a pot for entertaining/holidays/having guests over though and this was the recommendation. It’s FABULOUS. I don’t use it everyday, but when I do use it, it’s so sleek, easy and lovely to look at. Also delish! This and the breville espresso live in my pantry. BEAUTY Haus Labs concealer. I’ve been using the same concealer (too faced born this way) now for at least 5 years. Well, I started using this one and WOW – the shade is great and it is so hydrating. I love it! Doesn’t crease when set and is so creamy. The Maker Dream Perfume. New favorite scent alert! Can’t get enough of this goodness. Definitely a warm, cozy scent. XeraCalm Eczema Calming Relief Balm. My skin has been dry my entire life. This is SUCH a good cream!! I will use it after the shower then layer body oil on top. Great for the winter months too. Butter Brush dry brush. I dry brush before every shower, then follow up with cream + oil after. This is by far the best dry brush I have ever used. It’s so soft and buttery, but still exfoliates wonderfully.  FASHION Varley Zip sweat shirt. Adore this – the way it feels is amazing – super soft, high quality, but light at the same time. It’s almost silky. Varley is such excellent quality and lays so nicely. And looks super cute too. Water resistant insulated jacket. I love this jacket. It’s not a puffer but it’s loose and light while being warm at the same time. Fleece lined leggings. When our temps were -10 below zero for days on end, these were a LIFE SAVER. They are so stretchy but so warm. I probably couldn’t wear them when it’s higher than 20 degrees because I’m always hot. But they are so so comfortable and great for cold weather. MEDIA The Favorites. This was the most incredible book I’ve read in a long time! It’s fabulous. I’m still thinking of it 10 days later. The Pitt on Max. Noah Wyle is back!! And here in Pittsburgh!! KID All In Motion girls airy pullover. These are unreal. They feel JUST LIKE spanx air essentials loungewear, but for girls. I got Emilia a few varieties and everything is so soft, comfortable and cute. Mondo Llama valentine’s string art. We love doing micro holiday crafts and both Max and Emilia loved this. Jordan needed some extra help with it but he liked it too! These are super fun. Clay bead spinner for bracelets. We’re also in full bracelet mode over here. This bead spinner was life changing!! The kids also flipped over these different fun ones to add. [none of this is sponsored, i just love to tell you what i love every month! there are a few general affiliate links above! xo]
html:
A peek at everything I loved in January 2025!

FOOD

Trader Joe’s Aglio Olio seasoning. I can’t believe how much I love this. It is delicious on everything.

NYT chicken and red lentil soup. I’ve made this twice now and it’s incredible. I add a little more spice/heat but wow – so nourishing.

Patagonia Provisions sourdough crackers. New-to-me crackers that I LOVE. And I am not a huge cracker person.

My blueberry muffin baked oatmeal. We have been making this on REPEAT. I love it so so much. Great to prep ahead of time.

HOME

Souper Cubes. These are not new but I use them every week! I make so many soups and this is perfect to freeze portions. I love it. It’s very easy to pop out one portion or more.

White post-in notes. Sounds ridiculous, but these white post-its are so nice compared to the neon ones all over my kitchen. I also love the black ones!

Moccamaster coffee maker. I got one in December after not having a pot for coffee… basically, well, ever. I need a pot for entertaining/holidays/having guests over though and this was the recommendation. It’s FABULOUS. I don’t use it everyday, but when I do use it, it’s so sleek, easy and lovely to look at. Also delish! This and the breville espresso live in my pantry.

BEAUTY

Haus Labs concealer. I’ve been using the same concealer (too faced born this way) now for at least 5 years. Well, I started using this one and WOW – the shade is great and it is so hydrating. I love it! Doesn’t crease when set and is so creamy.

The Maker Dream Perfume. New favorite scent alert! Can’t get enough of this goodness. Definitely a warm, cozy scent.

XeraCalm Eczema Calming Relief Balm. My skin has been dry my entire life. This is SUCH a good cream!! I will use it after the shower then layer body oil on top. Great for the winter months too.

Butter Brush dry brush. I dry brush before every shower, then follow up with cream + oil after. This is by far the best dry brush I have ever used. It’s so soft and buttery, but still exfoliates wonderfully. 

FASHION

Varley Zip sweat shirt. Adore this – the way it feels is amazing – super soft, high quality, but light at the same time. It’s almost silky. Varley is such excellent quality and lays so nicely. And looks super cute too.

Water resistant insulated jacket. I love this jacket. It’s not a puffer but it’s loose and light while being warm at the same time.

Fleece lined leggings. When our temps were -10 below zero for days on end, these were a LIFE SAVER. They are so stretchy but so warm. I probably couldn’t wear them when it’s higher than 20 degrees because I’m always hot. But they are so so comfortable and great for cold weather.

MEDIA

The Favorites. This was the most incredible book I’ve read in a long time! It’s fabulous. I’m still thinking of it 10 days later.

The Pitt on Max. Noah Wyle is back!! And here in Pittsburgh!!

KID

All In Motion girls airy pullover. These are unreal. They feel JUST LIKE spanx air essentials loungewear, but for girls. I got Emilia a few varieties and everything is so soft, comfortable and cute.

Mondo Llama valentine’s string art. We love doing micro holiday crafts and both Max and Emilia loved this. Jordan needed some extra help with it but he liked it too! These are super fun.

Clay bead spinner for bracelets. We’re also in full bracelet mode over here. This bead spinner was life changing!! The kids also flipped over these different fun ones to add.

[none of this is sponsored, i just love to tell you what i love every month! there are a few general affiliate links above! xo]
